it.polimi.ingsw.xyl.model

类 GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.xyl.model.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the abstraction of A Santorini GAME, A game lobby handles with one or more game(board).
